LanguageData.ATB_TrapIED_Microscyther.label: Microscyther trap
LanguageData.ATB_TrapIED_Microscyther.description: A pair of microscyther shells with a simple pressure/contact trigger to unleash the units within. Since it is hidden in the surrounding terrain, it cannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Animals can sense these when calm.
LanguageData.ATB_TrapIED_Microscyther_Blueprint.label: Microscyther trap (blueprint)
LanguageData.ATB_TrapIED_Microscyther_Frame.label: Microscyther trap (building)
LanguageData.ATB_TrapIED_Microscyther_Frame.descripti: A pair of microscyther shells with a simple pressure/contact trigger to unleash the units within. Since it is hidden in the surrounding terrain, it cannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Animals can sense these when calm.
